00105 
00106         void run(NeuronIter _neuron)
00107         {
00108             BOOST_FOREACH( Link& link, _neuron->second.links )
00109             {
00110                 if(link.getDirection() == Link::in)
00111                 {
00112                     _neuron->second.receptiveField += 
00113                         ( link.getToIter()->second.activationValue * link.getWeightIter()->second.value );
00114                 }
00115             }
00116 
00117             _neuron->second.activationValue = _neuron->second.getActivationFunction()->f(_neuron->second.receptiveField);
00118             _neuron->second.receptiveField = 0;
00119         };
00120 
00121         virtual RunDirection getDirection()
00122         {
00123             return ForwardRun;
00124         };
00125     };
